svg.text: Monetization Architecture v2 / Closed SaaS + Open API + Agent Distribution
Vite + React + Supabase / where creators manage, tiers gate administration
1 creator, unlimited rankers, 3 active Wabbs, 2 GB
Agent full CRUD (Pro+: create Wabbs for you)
Flat tier pricing, unlimited rankers, iOS free at all tiers
SwiftUI + CoreHaptics / free at all tiers, closed source
Consumption layer: rank anywhere, sync everywhere
Magic link deep linking (one tap to rank)
Best feature seen by most people
Viral loop: invite rankers, they get the app
No comp gates mobile (Frame.io, Figma, etc.)
Agent distribution: first MCP-native ranking tool
AGENT / CLOSED PKG + OPEN API SPEC + DISTRIBUTION CHANNEL
Stripe model: proprietary SDK, public docs. Agents are free sales reps.
npm pkg / proprietary, free to use
All calls route through Wabbit Cloud
All agent traffic routes through here
Free: read-only / Pro+: full CRUD (the upgrade trigger)
Agents create value that drives subs
Every agent is an unpaid sales rep
Start with Stripe, add crypto (Base) later
OPEN API SPEC (THE ONLY OPEN THING)
OpenAPI/Swagger docs, webhook schemas, auth guides, suggested agent message templates
Closed SaaS + open API spec / iOS free at all tiers / agents are the top of the funnel
Two front doors: humans discover organically, agents discover via MCP and onboard humans proactively
